    Undergraduate courses

    Ulster University provides you with the knowledge, skills and confidence to enable you to find employment.

    Ready for Ulster

    • Are you ready for the #1 NI university for student satisfaction?*
    • Are you ready to join the 94% of our graduates in work or study within 6 months of graduating?**

    Fulfil your potential

    Fulfil your potential with an undergraduate degree from Ulster University.

    Whatever your ambitions, we have an exciting range of courses designed to prepare you for a successful future and a rewarding career.

    Get ready for a place where world-leading experts solve the problems of tomorrow and teach the talent of today.

    *National Student Survey 2018l **HESA Employability Performance Indicator (DLHE Survey 2016/17)

    Find courses

    Find your undergraduate course at Ulster University.

    Apply

    Information on how to apply for full-time and part-time undergraduate study at Ulster University.

    Undergraduate Prospectus

    Undergraduate opportunities at Ulster.

    Full-time fees

    Overview of fees for undergraduate courses at Ulster University.

    Part-time fees

    Studying part-time gives you the flexibility to learn and pay at your own pace. Part-time students typically complete their studies over 5-7 years.

    Students from England, Scotland and Wales

    Study in Northern Ireland at one of the UK’s most popular universities and experience a supportive learning environment and first class teaching.

    Further education students

    Further Education colleges offer a number of qualifications which meet the entrance requirements for our undergraduate courses.

    Associate students

    Find the Ulster University course linked to your current college course

    Student Experiences

    Hear from our undergraduate students.

    Higher Education qualifications

    Placement Awards

    Awards for work placement and study abroad at Ulster University.
